channel.title: My Halo 3 Clan (With Website & Forums)
channel.description: I am starting a Halo 3 Clan with my friend, we are both like beasts in double team, look in my sig for the website but add a /smf b/c thats the only thing i have working atm i am working on my layout. If you want to see my gamertag go to my profile on my forums and look. It's in there i have the mod for it. BTW i don't know if this is against the rules or not so if it is say so.

item.title: My Halo 3 Clan (With Website & Forums)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:13, topic:164429”][quote author=frost21 link=topic=223269.msg1931250#msg1931250 date=1197706707]

give me halo 3 a xbox 360 and about a month and ill pwn both of you at it.

Doubt it,you cant just be sure your gonna be good,even though cryme and his buddy are garbage.

doubt what? that i cant play video games? trust me dude if there is one thing im good at it is playing video games…

No the fact you can beat me in a month,unless you played halo 2 a ton you wont.

Not that I played halo 2…well since you said you never played 3 I assume if you havent played atleast 2 you wont beat me
[/quote]

i play halo 1 on the time… i played halo 2 a few times and its pretty easy… im assuming halo 3 isnt that different.[/quote]

Halo 1 is different,halo 2 is easy?How so?Were you even playing on live?What ranks were the people you were playing?Do you just camp all game?Can you even us a br?

Read full topic

Not that I played halo 2…well since you said you never played 3 I assume if you havent played atleast 2 you wont beat me :)[/quote]

i play halo 1 on the time… i played halo 2 a few times and its pretty easy… im assuming halo 3 isnt that different.

[quote=“Cryme Time, post:9, topic:164429”][quote author=frost21 link=topic=223269.msg1929817#msg1929817 date=1197625602]

give me halo 3 a xbox 360 and about a month and ill pwn both of you at it.

Doubt it,you cant just be sure your gonna be good,even though cryme and his buddy are garbage.
